radiographic_examinations.findings: Lower Thorax: The lung bases are clear with no pleural effusion; Liver: Focal fat in hepatic segment 4, otherwise homogeneous; No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation; Normal gallbladder with no sludge or stone; Pancreas homogeneous in signal with no lesions; Normal spleen size; Normal adrenal glands; Normal kidneys with no hydronephrosis; Normal caliber bowel without obstruction; No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy; No thrombosis or aneurysm in vasculature; 1.0 cm T2 hyperintense heterogeneously enhancing lesion in the anterior abdominal wall suggestive of resolving infectious/collection.
